meanings.definition: A type of succulent plant known for its ability to propagate through its leaves.
meanings.sent1: The bryophyllums in the garden are spreading quickly.
meanings.sent2: I bought some bryophyllums for my succulent collection.
meanings.sent3: The bryophyllums seem to be having a leafy party in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her love for bryophyllums grew as fast as their leaves.
meanings.sent5: The bryophyllums looked like tiny green stars in the pot.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'bryophyllum', referring to multiple plants of this species.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of bryophyllums growing near the rocks.
meanings.sent2: The bryophyllums in the greenhouse are thriving.
meanings.sent3: The bryophyllums decided to have a race to see who could grow tallest.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of bryophyllums, each one a tiny world of its own.
meanings.sent5: The bryophyllums danced in the wind, a green wave under the sun.
